classification.use_when: tabular data, medium to large datasets, feature interactions important
classification.reasoning: Handles non-linear relationships well, robust to outliers, provides feature importance

classification.use_when: linear relationships, need interpretability, smaller datasets
classification.reasoning: Simple, fast, interpretable coefficients, works well for linearly separable data

classification.use_when: structured data, competitions, need high accuracy
classification.reasoning: State-of-the-art performance on tabular data, handles missing values, regularization

regression.use_when: linear relationships, continuous target, need interpretability
regression.reasoning: Simple baseline, fast training, easy to interpret, works well for linear trends

regression.use_when: non-linear relationships, tabular data, feature interactions
regression.reasoning: Captures complex patterns, handles outliers, minimal hyperparameter tuning

regression.use_when: structured data, need high accuracy, have computational resources
regression.reasoning: Excellent performance on tabular data, handles different feature scales

clustering.use_when: spherical clusters expected, know number of clusters, large datasets
clustering.reasoning: Fast and scalable, simple to understand, works well for separated groups

clustering.use_when: arbitrary shaped clusters, unknown cluster count, noise in data
clustering.reasoning: Finds clusters of varying shapes, identifies outliers, no need to specify k

clustering.use_when: small to medium datasets, want dendrogram, explore different k values
clustering.reasoning: Provides hierarchy of clusters, no need to specify k upfront, interpretable

time_series.use_when: univariate series, stationary data, seasonal patterns
time_series.reasoning: Classical approach, handles trends and seasonality, interpretable parameters

time_series.use_when: multivariate series, long-term dependencies, sufficient data
time_series.reasoning: Captures complex temporal patterns, handles multiple variables, learns sequences

time_series.use_when: daily observations, strong seasonal effects, missing data
time_series.reasoning: Robust to missing data and outliers, intuitive parameters, handles holidays

dimensionality_reduction.reasoning: Finds principal components, preserves variance, reduces noise
Excellent for 2D/3D visualization, captures local structure, reveals clusters

dimensionality_reduction.reasoning: Scalable, preserves both local and global structure, supports supervised mode
